channel.title: Client wont run
channel.description:
when i try to run a 508 client i get this
[CODE]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: */java Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: *.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) [/CODE]
heres the run.bat
[CODE]@echo off java -Xmx256M client 60 live live hardware members english game0 pause[/CODE]

item.title: Client wont run
item.dc:creator: @P_16 P 16
item.description:
@P_16 wrote:

when i try to run a 508 client i get this

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: */java Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: *.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)

heres the run.bat

@echo off java -Xmx256M client 60 live live hardware members english game0 pause
